tags.name: Retail
tags.description: Location level data for retail items sold

tags.name: Supplier
tags.description: Location level data for supplier items

get.description: Returns location level data for retail items

parameters.name: org_value
parameters.description: Aramark Location code

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Text used to search for a specific product (Must use if NOT using Barcode)

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode value for a specific item (Must use if NOT using Search)

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: Value used to determine whether output includes CPG item, non CPG items, or all items

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

count.description: Number of records returned in request

post.description: Submit a request to have new retail item(s) created

requestBody.description: List of Items to have created with contact information.

get.description: Returns location level data for supplier items

parameters.name: org_value
parameters.description: Aramark Location code; Required if MSA not provided

parameters.name: msa
parameters.description: MSA of item

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

200.description: Lists Supplier Item details by Location

count.description: Number of records returned in request

page.description: Page Number of the result set

get.description: Returns location level data for supplier items

parameters.name: msa
parameters.description: MSA of item

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

200.description: Lists Supplier Item details by Location

count.description: Number of records returned in request

page.description: Page Number of the result set

get.description: Returns location level data for supplier receipts

parameters.name: org_value
parameters.description: Aramark Location code

parameters.name: start_date_time
parameters.description: Used to specify the starting date. Goes against Last Updated Date Time. Format - "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI"

parameters.name: end_date_time
parameters.description: Used to specify the ending date. Goes against Last Updated Date Time. Format - "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI"

parameters.name: msa
parameters.description: List of MSAs by which to filter. Limited to 25 comma separated values

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Used to specify the type of Receipt

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

200.description: Lists Supplier Receipt details by Location

count.description: Number of records returned in request

page.description: Page Number of the result set

post.description: Submit a request to lookup SKUs

requestBody.description: Parameters used to identify SKU lookup

count.description: Number of records returned in request

post.description: Submit a request to lookup POs

requestBody.description: Parameters used to identify PO lookup

count.description: Number of records returned in request

parameters.name: po_number
parameters.description: PO Number

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of result set. Default to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of result set. Default to 50.

parameters.name: bypass-cache
parameters.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

count.description: Number of records returned in request

page.description: Page Number of the result set

msa.description: MSA of the Item to lookup

source_location_id.description: Unique ID for the source location

revenue_center_id.description: Unique ID for the revenue center

barcode.description: Item barcode. This is a UPC (12-digit number with leading zeros.)

major_id.description: Unique ID for the major group

minor_id.description: Unique ID for the minor group

source_id.description: Unique ID for the source system of the item; Required

location_type_id.description: Unique ID for the type of location; Required

location_code.description: Aramark code for the location; Required when location_type_id=1

source_location_id.description: POS Location ID; Required when location_type_id=3

revenue_center_id.description: POS Revenue Center ID; Required when location_type_id=3

csp_location_id.description: CSP Location ID; Required when location_type_id=2

contact_phone.description: Phone Number of the requestor; Required

email.description: Email Address of the requestor; Required

effective_date.description: Date the items will need to be available by; Optional

request_type.description: Numeric value to indicate the type of request; 1-New, 2-Add, 3-Update, 4-Delete; Required

item_name.description: Name of the item; Required for request_type=1 or New Menu Item

object_number.description: Number for the object; Required for request_type=2,3,4

barcode.description: Barcode for the item; Required for request_type=1 or New CPG Item

catalog.description: Catalog to place the item in; Optional

slu.description: Screen Look Up code for item; Optional

price.description: Price of the item; Required for request_type=2,3

supplier_item_description.description: Supplier Item Description of the Item

order_unit_of_measure.description: Order Unit of Measure of the Item

item_base_unit_of_measure.description: Item Unit of Measure of the Item

is_delete_marked.description: Flag to deteremine delete status of the Item

product_master_id.description: Product Master ID of the Item

product_master_description.description: Product Master Description of the Item

product_master_source.description: Product Master Source of the Item

category_short_description.description: Category Short Description of the Item

category_long_description.description: Category Long Description of the Item

price_by_pound.description: Price By Pound of the Item

average_weight_in_pounds.description: Average Weight in Pounds of the Item

last_updated_date.description: Last Updated Date of the Item

vendor_name.description: Name of the Vendor of the Receipt

supplier_credit_memo.description: Supplier Credit Memo of the Receipt

doc_creation_date.description: Doc Creation Date of the Receipt

purchase_unit_of_measure.description: Purchase Unit of Measure of the Receipt

country_legal_entity.description: Country Legal Entity of the Receipt

user_email_address.description: User Email Address of the Receipt

manufacturer_part_number.description: Manufacturer Part Number of the Receipt

base_unit_of_measurement.description: Base Unit of Measurement of the Receipt

mdg_item_category_id.description: MDG Item Category ID of the Receipt

last_updated_datetime.description: Last Updated Date of the Receipt

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server

searchParam.name: search
searchParam.description: Text used to search for a specific product (Must use if NOT using Barcode)

barcodeParam.name: barcode
barcodeParam.description: Barcode value for a specific item (Must use if NOT using Search)

cpgParam.name: cpg_only
cpgParam.description: Boolean value to determine whether to return only CPG items

itemTypeParam.name: item_type
itemTypeParam.description: Value used to determine whether output includes CPG item, non CPG items, or all items

startDateTimeParam.name: start_date_time
startDateTimeParam.description: Used to specify the starting date. Goes against Last Updated Date Time. Format - "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI"

endDateTimeParam.name: end_date_time
endDateTimeParam.description: Used to specify the ending date. Goes against Last Updated Date Time. Format - "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MI"

typeParam.name: type
typeParam.description: Used to specify the type of Receipt

msaParam.name: msa
msaParam.description: List of MSAs by which to filter. Limited to 25 comma separated values

orgValueConditionalParam.name: org_value
orgValueConditionalParam.description: Aramark Location code; Required if MSA not provided

bodyParam.description: List of Items to have created with contact information.

skuBodyParam.description: Parameters used to identify SKU lookup

apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security
apikey.name: apikey
